website_summaries.verdict: Great-tasting peanut butter powder that gives users a reduced level of fat versus others.
pros: Has no artificial sweeteners, yet gives you a good taste and level of flavor
Good consistency that makes it a nice choice for protein shakes
Natural ingredients that will work well in recipes that call for peanut butter
cons: A little more expensive than other powders

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!  NOT Original PB2!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating PB2 for years and this is NOT the original! First of all, it has more calories than PB2. Second, it's much darker. But the worst part is it has a horrible after taste. And to add insult to injury, I cannot return this item even though it was purchased on Prime. Save yourself some money and buy elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jana in Carlsbad

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Peanut Butter substitute
customer_reviews.text: Love PB2 as an addition to my protein shakes. Gives some extra flavor and protein without too many calories. I love peanut butter and this is a way for me to get it without the extra fat. Nice addition of the scoop so I don't have to find a measuring spoon or guess. I have made Peanut Butter with the powder, it is not as good as the real thing but pretty close if you are trying to watch your fat and calorie intake. Thank you...also quick shipping was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Came when expected, undamaged and packaged together as two. I use this product with a vanilla protein powder for a morning breakfast protein shake. Adding this makes it like having a peanut butter shake from a diner, love it. I'm also currently on a medically supervised diet and this is one of the products they allow in addition to their food. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P

customer_reviews.title: This stuff's the greatest!
customer_reviews.text: If you like peanut butter, but don't like the fat and calories, this is for you! Simply mix with water, and you have the best tasting peanut butter! This has been very useful- I put it on whole wheat bread as a sandwich, and it has been part of a successful weight loss. I don't think I'll ever give it up. It's delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Down wit it

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a healthy alternative to peanut butter that tastes great!It has 85% less fat and 1⁄4 of the calories but tastes great. It's so convenient to travel with. I put some in a zip loc baggy and reconstitute it with water. I also just made a low fat Thai Chicken Salad using PB2 and it was delicious! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We started using PB2 powder a couple of years ago. My family likes this much better than the traditional jar of peanut butter. This powder is so much healthier for you. It does not have all that oil but is certainly does have a lot of flavor. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: L. Burney

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product!
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be very tasty, no grit and smooth. It's so low in calories and fat content, it's surprising that it's that healthy. I constantly crave sugar, so I just add Splenda for additional sweetness, but again, that's just my preference. Shipped fast. Yes, I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ShaynaO

customer_reviews.title: PB2 Rocks
customer_reviews.text: What's not like! This is the best tasting peanut butter that I've ever tasted. I like the fact that you make it up when you want a sandwich. The thing I like the best is that this product has all but taken out the fat. It satisfies your appetite and leaves no craving for more high fat foods. I would highly recommend this product. It goes along way too!
customer_reviews.author: catlady

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as I have seen it used in recipes to try to cut down on calories from regular peanut butter. I used in a smoothie with Almond Milk and also mixed with fat free whipped topping. It is good and Let's me get my peanut butter fix without feeling guilty from all the calories!
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and I love the product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and I love the product. It's my favorite peanut butter substitute, better for me than PB Fit (which has a little bit of a weird taste). One side note - add salt to the PB before you eat it, that's the one thing it needs.
customer_reviews.author: J. McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, the best powdered peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I tried several: PBfit, PB&Me and PB2. I can honestly say PB2 tastes the best, with that toasty peanut buttery rich tastes. It also has the finest texture. I eat it with a spoon. Love how it clumps and slowly "melts" in my mouth. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KateL

customer_reviews.title: PB2
customer_reviews.text: Not bad with jelly and crackers. don't mix it too far ahead of time ahead of time - it gets hard. try to mix it fresh if possible. 2 parts PB2 to 1 part H2O
customer_reviews.author: E. Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Great to mix in smoothies, pancakes, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Love it and recommend it all the time. I've never mixed this product with water to make PB, but it's super convenient to throw in smoothies or pancakes for extra protein and flavor without all the fat/calories of traditional PB.
customer_reviews.author: Annina

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this product....was my first try and I really think the taste and consistency are EXCELLENT. The savings in fat, calories and oil is TOTALLY worth having to mix the powder with water to make the peanut butter...but now I can enjoy my peanut butter GUILT FREE! yay!
customer_reviews.author: cindye

customer_reviews.title: It's good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've used PB2 for several years, first buying it directly from Bell Plantation, and then later finding it in some grocery stores. It is easy to use, I love the fact it is REAL and has no artificial additives. It is good for baked items, it is good to use as a spread on sandwiches, etc. etc. I ordered it from Amazon because I could get two large jars for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Elgie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Always have this on hand and a backup supply. I eat it pretty much every day - in smoothies, in yogurt, on bananas, apples, PB&J sammie, love love love it. A GREAT alternative to the full fat peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: iriskitty

customer_reviews.title: Great peanut taste and it is low in Weight Watcher ...
customer_reviews.text: Great peanut taste and it is low in Weight Watcher points and tastes great. This was a lot less expensive than buying it in the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: It’s delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Keep in mind you can use more or less water to get the consistency you like. The directions give you very dry pb. I add extra water for smooth pb. I can’t go back to regular pb.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: PB2 IS BETTER THAN PEANUT BUTTER!
customer_reviews.text: PB 2 tastes like regular peanut butter and is simple to make in a bowl - just stir, It has a third of the calories of real peanut butter and is delicious. It has taken its place in my food pantry and goes great with bread or toast, or crackers. I pat my brother on the back for discovering PB2 on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stargoat

customer_reviews.title: Did not get what was pictured/ what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get what i ordered and i can't return it. Bummed. The one pictured is 85% less fat with 45 calories. 90% less fat but with 60 calories showed up. When you are counting every little calorie, 15 make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy J. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great taste with less fat & calories!
customer_reviews.text: Love this as an alternative for regular peanut butters with far less calories & fat! Taste is great & you can make it as thick or thin as you would like!
customer_reviews.author: B & A Wilso

customer_reviews.title: Pb2 has the best taste!
customer_reviews.text: I mix pb2 with milk and chocolate protein powder...(sometimes I use water instead of milk) either way, it's a nutritional breakfast for me every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Drena

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: How did they take the fat out of peanut butter while keeping it tasty? I’m impressed! Great stuff and you can mix it into shakes, smoothies, etc before blending since it’s a powder. I’m sure there are going to be haters who don’t like this because it’s not exactly peanut butter. To those people I’d say fine, just go buy peanut butter, but PB2 is healthy and tastes good. Hats off to whoever created this!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Wienand

customer_reviews.title: Really gives it great flavor and A LOT less Fat and calories
customer_reviews.text: I was using peanut butter and the calorie and fat content was to high...I decided to try this. You can make your own peanut butter using water or just add the powder to anything. I add it to my yogurt. Really gives it great flavor and A LOT less Fat and calories....
customer_reviews.author: rg

customer_reviews.title: PB2 - GREAT IF YOU WANT TO KEEP CALORIES DOWN.
customer_reviews.text: I AM TRYING TO KEEP MY CALORIES DOWN, AND I LOVE PEANUT BUTTER, AND THIS IS A GOOD ALTERNATIVE TO HIGH CALORIE PEANUT BUTTER.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to the peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far but it tastes good. You need to add a little sweetner - stevia is what I use.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Jenco

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend. Can't believe that the price went up that much because a scoop and some recipes were added to it
customer_reviews.author: Rahlene

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: If you have tried other types of powdered peanut butter you'll fine this has the best taste so far. I add this to many foods to get an extra boost of protein. You can mix it up and drink it like soup.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: We love that webcam have peanut butter without all the fat! Great for frosting, ice cream, and shakes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Put PeanutButter in Your Pocket
customer_reviews.text: I really (really!) dragged my feet in the “low fat powdered peanut butter” rage. But - Wow! I am so glad I gave it a try! Great price, packaging, and a great way to add a nice, rich flavor to smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: walkinggirl1234

customer_reviews.title: My vegan daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has gone through four jars in a few weeks and says that PB2 is DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Its slightly less creamy than peanut butter but there IS less fat so that is to be expected. I do not mind at all and I think it tastes great. Easy to prepare and spread. Great for camping/long hikes or everyday use. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KD1818

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our smoothies
customer_reviews.text: We use this product several times a week. In our smoothies, oatmeal, over icecream. It tastes great and has loads of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Great for Those of Us on Weight Watchers
customer_reviews.text: My favorite way to eat this is in plain Greek yogurt. I mix it up and add a banana and blueberries. It's delish!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Anne Incalcaterra

customer_reviews.title: PB2, powdered peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I like PB2 because I have a lot of recipes that I use it in. It a way of getting peanut butter flavor with less calories.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy about Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Thai Chicken Salad
customer_reviews.text: I love PB2. I have been using it for several years. I like to put it on bananas, apples, and toast. I just made the Healthy Thai Chicken Salad recipe that was included in my recent order. It is delicious. I added chopped carrots, but you could add any vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have not calculated the amount of calories I am saving, there are many! Love the flavor I can add to smoothies and even a low calorie Thai Peanut Butter Sauce.
customer_reviews.author: CMcKay9

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good if you're on a diet but need a peanut butter hit!

customer_reviews.title: Product’s seal was broken and not what I ordered..
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 85% less fat product and label read 90% less fat . Received a different jar than shown on Amazon. More importantly, one of the seals on a 16 oz. jar in the two- pack was broken and the powder was all over the outside of the jar when I opened it. Returning it.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, I mix it in with my morning protein shake

customer_reviews.title: I purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and the recipient was very pleased by the quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: I was very worried that I wouldn't like this PB2 but I think it is as tasty as Jif! It's nice to have less fat but still have good taste!

customer_reviews.title: Great In Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this product and I doubled it from last time love it.

customer_reviews.text: Dogs love some of this sprinkled on their food! We Love to use it too!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Tastes like real pb, great in oatmeal, shakes, or on a sandwich

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and super taste, very low in carbs. Excellent for shakes. Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: This so much better than the peanut butter you are currently using.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't opened either of these yet, but this is my absolute favorite peanut butter & I never want to run out!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: ... peanut butter flavor without all of the fat - love it, love it
customer_reviews.text: Lovely peanut butter flavor without all of the fat - love it, love it, yum!!!!

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Using in my protein powder and also mixes for guilt free snack with celery, I LOVE this stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shakes and smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Blends perfectly into shakes and smoothies, great alternative to cut heavy oils and extra calories. Mixes with water to make peanut butter but it’s not quite as creamy so I still prefer regular peanut butter for that purpose.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Adds good flavor to gross protein shakes

customer_reviews.title: I love PB!
customer_reviews.text: Very good and reasonably priced. The scooper is very conveinient, but I was not sure if it was exact serving size at first, had to wiehg it out.

customer_reviews.title: Protein booster !
customer_reviews.text: Great product , especially in a protein shake for added protein. Mixes really well and has a good taste !

customer_reviews.title: Peanut butter substitute
customer_reviews.text: Peanut butter powder with less fat than regular Peanut butter. Great for mixing into yoghurt. Nice taste - contains a little sugar. If you are looking for sugar free there are other products on the market.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I use it for everything from sauces to sandwiches. It is much less fat and calories than regular peanut butter and tastes great!

customer_reviews.text: This product is a dream come true for me. I love peanut butter but it is so high in fat and calories. I usually eat PB2 on a light English Muffin, toasted. It tastes great!

customer_reviews.title: Love PB2

product_meta.title: PB2 Powdered Peanut Butter Plain 2 Pack with BONUS Scoop and 3 Delicious PB2 Recipes, 2 1lbs jars from Bell Plantation
product_meta.description: PB2 Powdered Peanut Butter Plain 2 Pack with BONUS Scoop and 3 Delicious PB2 Recipes, 2 1lbs jars from Bell Plantation
feature_bullets: NO ADDITIVES – Peanut butter has always been a staple for the health conscious and physically active. But even peanut butter can be improved. PB2 reduces fat through a chemical-free process. Like all Bell Plantation products, PB2 and Chocolate PB2 are all natural, preservative free, and contain no artificial sweeteners. And that makes them a sweet alternative for active lifestyles, dieters, and moms who want healthy snacks for their kids.

ALL NATURAL - Made from freshly roasted peanuts, PB2 Powdered Peanut Butter is mixed with water to create a traditional peanut butter mixture. It also works and tastes wonderfully in recipes that call for the use of peanut butter. Check our free bonus recipes card for great ideas on how to use your PB2.

LESS FAT - 85% less fat calories than traditional peanut butter! Superior quality peanuts are first slow roasted then pressed to remove the fat and oil. The result is an exquisitely natural roasted peanut butter flavor that's deliciously rich in taste, easy to enjoy and wonderfully healthy, with twice the healthy proteins per gram than its traditional counterpart.

FREE BONUS GIFTS – Each two-pack of PB2 comes with a reusable scoop, perfectly sized to equal one serving of PB2 powdered Peanut Butter, and a double-sided, reusable recipe card with our hand-picked favorite powdered peanut butter recipes you’re sure to enjoy. You won’t receive either gift with any other Amazon listing, so look no further!
The Best Powdered Peanut Butter on the Market today!
